Property Description

Key features

  • Refurbished Victorian Style Property
  • Outstanding Location By St George Park
  • Characterful Front Reception Room
  • Kitchen/Diner With Large Glass Doors
  • Two Bedrooms With Fitted Storage
  • First Floor Bathroom
  • Double Glazing And Gas Central Heating
  • Excellent Access To Commuter Routes Into Bristol City Centre

Full description

Parks Estate Agents are delighted to offer for sale this stunning refurbished Victorian style property a stone's throw from ST GEORGE PARK. The property comprises, attractive front reception room with wooden floors and new kitchen/diner with large glass doors to a rear courtyard garden. The first floor offers two bedrooms and gorgeous bathroom. Also benefitting from gas central heating, double glazing and an outstanding location. The vendor has carried out substantial improvement works during their ownership, don't miss your chance for a viewing. Email or call us now to register your interest in what's sure to be a popular property!
